item.title: Fulton County: ‘We Don’t Dispute’ 315,000 Votes Lacking Poll Workers’ Signatures Were Counted In 2020
item.description: 'When the law demands three signatures on tabulator tapes and the county fails to follow the rules, those 315,000 votes are, by definition, uncertifie...

item.title: Poll: Americans Want Pro-Family Policies Including Abortion Limits, Mifepristone Safeguards
item.description: Widespread support for having kids and raising a family is exactly why the Hawleys say they created Love Life Initiative.

item.title: Buried In Debt: Report Finds Government Spending Per Person Soared 10,000 Percent Over Last Century
item.description: 'While American families and businesses find a way to do more with less, the government does less with more,' said OpenTheBooks' John Hart.

item.title: State-Sanctioned Suicide Is The 4th Leading Cause Of Death In Canada
item.description: 'The doctors who advocate for it call it compassion, but ethical doctors are healers, not killers.'

item.title: Ending Mail-Order Abortion Would Fulfill 3 Trump Campaign Promises
item.description: The medical reasons that led prior FDAs to require in-person doctor visits before women could access the abortion pill still stand.
